synthesis_conditions.transformation: transformed to [Zn(pvb)2] (2) by the removal of DMF
synthesis_conditions.comments: The loss of DMF guest in 1 starts losing very slowly from room temperature and then rapidly in the specified temperature range.

synthesis_conditions.solvents: solvent mixture of DMA and water
synthesis_conditions.comments: Crystallized from a solvent mixture of DMA and water, has no guest solvent retained in the lattice.
The VT-XRPD patterns reveal that the removal of DMF from 3 does not influence any structural change like that in 1.

synthesis_conditions.formation_method: formed after DMF removal from [Cu(pvb)2]·DMF (3) and exposure to moisture
synthesis_conditions.structural_comparison_with_solvated_form: The non-centrosymmetric group Cc was still maintained in the crystal after cooling to room temperature.
